name: FAB_2100
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}, " ", {[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","General Motor Fault")
Debug Prompt: Verify the drive is powered.  Check all cables to drive.  Check breakers to drive.  Check all cables to motor.

name: FAB_001
label: PLC Offline
Debug Prompt: The PLC has not initialized properly.  Cycle the power on the SSC.  If it persists, delete the file C:\TwinCAT\3.1\Boot\Plc\Port_851.bootdata-old and cycle the power on the PLC.

name: FAB_2101
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","ECAM Table Error")
Debug Prompt: Cycle the power on the FAB.

name: FAB_2102
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Commutation Error, Check drive tuning")
Debug Prompt: Check encoder cables.  Place figure in inactive.  Try to physically move the axis and see if position changes in diagnostics screen on HMI.

name: FAB_002
label: Required Configuration Files Not Found - Restore missing files or image PLC from Backup
Debug Prompt: The PLC has not loaded its configuration files properly.  Check the files in C:\settings and C:\data on the PLC to verify that they match the backup files.  Delete the file C:\TwinCAT\3.1\Boot\Plc\Port_851.bootdata-old.

name: FAB_003
label: FAB Temperature Critical -- LStop Engaged
Debug Prompt: The maximum temperature limit has been exceeded and the SSC will not function until the temperature is reduced.  Verify the function of the A/C unit.  Verify the settings on the temperature control unit.

name: FAB_2103
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Hall Sensor Feedback - Check encoder cable")
Debug Prompt: Check encoder cables.  Place figure in inactive.  Try to physically move the axis and see if position changes in diagnostics screen on HMI.

name: FAB_004
label: Temperature Limit Exceeded -- Check A/C Unit Wiring
Debug Prompt: The first high temperature limit has been passed.  The SSC will still function, but the alarm will remain until the temperature is reduced.  Verify the function of the A/C unit.  Verify the settings on the temperature control unit.

name: FAB_2104
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Current Limit Exceeded - Check function for mechanical jam, obstruction or impingement")
Debug Prompt: Place figure in inactive.  Try to physically move the axis and see if position changes in diagnostics screen on HMI.

name: FAB_005
label: FAB 24V DC Load Power Supply Not OK
Debug Prompt: Check the power supply unit for fault lights.  Verify power input and power output cables.  Restart the FAB.

name: FAB_2105
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Hall Sensor Speed - Check Encoder Cable")
Debug Prompt: Check encoder cables.  Place figure in inactive.  Try to physically move the axis and see if position changes in diagnostics screen on HMI.

name: FAB_006
label: FAB 24V DC Servo Power Supply Not OK
Debug Prompt: Check the power supply unit for fault lights.  Verify power input and power output cables.  Restart the SSC.

name: FAB_2106
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Speed Tracking Drive - Check mechanical linkages, wiring")
Debug Prompt: Check encoder cables.  Place figure in inactive.  Try to physically move the axis and see if position changes in diagnostics screen on HMI.

name: FAB_007
label: PLC Offline
Debug Prompt: The PLC has not initialized properly.  Cycle the power on the SSC.  If it persists, delete the file C:\TwinCAT\3.1\Boot\Plc\Port_851.bootdata-old and cycle the power on the PLC.

name: FAB_2107
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Speed Tracking PLC -Check mechanical linkages, wiring")
Debug Prompt: Check encoder cables.  Place figure in inactive.  Try to physically move the axis and see if position changes in diagnostics screen on HMI.

name: FAB_2108
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Position Tracking Drive - Check mechanical linkages, wiring")
Debug Prompt: Check encoder cables.  Place figure in inactive.  Try to physically move the axis and see if position changes in diagnostics screen on HMI.

name: FAB_2109
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Position Tracking PLC - Check mechanical linkages, wiring")
Debug Prompt: Check encoder cables.  Place figure in inactive.  Try to physically move the axis and see if position changes in diagnostics screen on HMI.

name: FAB_010
label: LSS ESTOP Active
Debug Prompt: The L-Stop bus is active.  Press Reset on the FAB.  Cycle the L-Stop button on the front panel of the FAB and press Reset.

name: FAB_2110
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Drive Undervoltage - Check drive power supply")
Debug Prompt: Check power supply.  Check wiring to Drive.  Check cables to motor.

name: FAB_011
label: LSS ESTOP Input Discrepancy - Check Safety Relays, Wiring
Debug Prompt: Check the wiring to the L-Stop button on the front panel of the SSC.  Verify the function of the L-Stop button.

name: FAB_2111
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Drive Overvoltage -  Check drive power supply")
Debug Prompt: Check power supply.  Check wiring to Drive.  Check cables to motor.

name: FAB_012
label: LSS Heartbeat Lost - Verify Ethernet Adapter Connection, FAB Switch, and LSS Status
Debug Prompt: Check the network connection to the EL6652 card on the PLC.  Verify all network cables are securely plugged in.  Verify the RSS/LSS is functioning properly.

name: FAB_2112
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","STOs Active - Verify LSTOP reset, STOs have been released")
Debug Prompt: Check STO wiring to PLC (EL2904).  Cycle the L-Stop button and press Reset.

name: FAB_2113
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Drive Short Circuit - Check wiring")
Debug Prompt: Unplug cables to motor and see if the fault clears.  Unplug connectors to drive one at a time (except power input) and see if the fault clears.  Check wires/cables for isolated problem.

name: FAB_2114
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Drive Overtemp - Check FAB A/C unit")
Debug Prompt: Make sure the A/C unit is functioning properly.  If no other drives have an overtemp error, check the current in the Debug window to see if it is excessive (magnitude consistently over 1000 when moving, over 500 when not moving).  If the current is high, check the mechanism for obstructions.

name: FAB_2115
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Drive Overspeed")
Debug Prompt: Power cycle the FAB.

name: FAB_2116
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Drive CPU exception")
Debug Prompt: Power cycle the FAB.

name: FAB_1117
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Motor Stuck - Check function is not mechanically jammed, obstructed or impinged")
Debug Prompt: Place figure in inactive.  Try to physically move the axis and see if position changes in diagnostics screen on HMI.  Make sure the brake is released (use the brake release tool if necessary).

name: FAB_2119
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Drive Failed to Start - Check STOs, motor connections, cabling.")
Debug Prompt: Primarily a power problem.  Check STOs.  Check breakers to drive.  Check power cables to drive.  Check power cables to motor.

name: FAB_2120
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Drive External Inhibit active")
Debug Prompt: Power cycle the FAB.

name: FAB_2121
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Drive Database Error")
Debug Prompt: Power cycle the FAB.

name: FAB_2122
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Drive Communication Fault - Check Ethernet connection in FAB")
Debug Prompt: Check drive ethernet cables.  Cycle power on drive.

name: FAB_2123
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","General Homing Fault - Re-Home required")
Debug Prompt: Re-home the motor.  Attempt to jog the motor to the positive and negative extremes of travel.  Place figure in inactive.  Try to physically move the axis and see if position changes in diagnostics screen on HMI.  Make sure the brake is released (use the brake release tool if necessary).

name: FAB_2124
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Homing Counts High")
Debug Prompt: Re-home the motor.  If it still fails, Place figure in inactive.  Try to physically move the axis and see if position changes in diagnostics screen on HMI.  Make sure the brake is released (use the brake release tool if necessary).  Check the mechanism for damage or obstruction.    If the mechanism appears OK, attempt to jog the motor to the positive and negative extremes of travel.

name: FAB_2125
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Homing Counts Low")
Debug Prompt: Re-home the motor.  If it still fails, Place figure in inactive.  Try to physically move the axis and see if position changes in diagnostics screen on HMI.  Make sure the brake is released (use the brake release tool if necessary).  Check the mechanism for damage or obstruction.    If the mechanism appears OK, attempt to jog the motor to the positive and negative extremes of travel.

name: FAB_2126
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Homing Positive Hardstop")
Debug Prompt: Re-home the motor.  If it still fails, Place figure in inactive.  Try to physically move the axis and see if position changes in diagnostics screen on HMI.  Make sure the brake is released (use the brake release tool if necessary).  Check the mechanism for damage or obstruction.    If the mechanism appears OK, attempt to jog the motor to the positive and negative extremes of travel.

name: FAB_2127
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Homing Negative Hardstop")
Debug Prompt: Re-home the motor.  If it still fails, Place figure in inactive.  Try to physically move the axis and see if position changes in diagnostics screen on HMI.  Make sure the brake is released (use the brake release tool if necessary).  Check the mechanism for damage or obstruction.    If the mechanism appears OK, attempt to jog the motor to the positive and negative extremes of travel.

name: FAB_2128
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Homing Current")
Debug Prompt: Re-home the motor. Examine the current on the Diagnostics page of the HMI while homing.  Verify that the magnitude of the current remains low (less than 1000) during most homing motion and does not exxceed 1500 at any point.  If the current is high, check the mechanism for obstructions.

name: FAB_2129
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Load Cell Out Of Range")
Debug Prompt: Power cycle the FAB.

name: FAB_2130
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","EtherCAT SYNC group for this drive is not OK. Check for drive faults within the group")
Debug Prompt: Power cycle the FAB.

name: FAB_2131
value: concat({[.]../../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ",{[.]../../stHmi/stLid/sStsName}," ","Homing Timeout - Check sensor mechanism")
Debug Prompt: Re-home the motor. If failure persists, check sensor for functionality. Verify sensor flag integrity. Verify sensor distance away from sensor flag.

name: FAB_298
value: concat({[.]../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ","Frame Collision Detected - Check sensor, mechanism")
Debug Prompt: Verify that sensor is functioning properly. The light on the sensor should be illuminated when flagging the plate. Engage Bypass, Reset Faults, Jog Up/Down Axis Up until Collision Check is Green

name: FAB_099
label: One or more active system alarms have exceeded reset limit. Mode cycle required
Debug Prompt: Turn the FAB OFF.  Return it to the previous condition.

name: FAB_299
value: concat({[.]../stHmi/sStsFigureName}," ","One or more active figure alarms have exceeded reset limit. Mode cycle required")
Debug Prompt: Turn the FAB OFF.  Return it to the previous condition.
